title: conv2d Segmentation Fault
body_html:
The following throws a segmentation fault:

import torch
from torch.autograd import Variable
from torch.nn.functional import conv2d
conv2d(Variable(torch.Tensor(1, 1, 10, 10)), Variable(torch.Tensor(3, 3)))

Relevant to the above, the error for the following code (trying to use a 3D weight tensor)

import torch
from torch.autograd import Variable
from torch.nn.functional import conv2d
conv2d(Variable(torch.Tensor(1, 1, 10, 10)), Variable(torch.Tensor(1, 3, 3)))

is:

RuntimeError: invalid argument 5: 2D or 4D weight tensor expected, but got: [1 x 3 x 3]
